name: Style Theme Guard
description: Protects the Zombie IE6 horror-comedy aesthetic by checking style changes for theme consistency

action.message:
üé® CURSED STYLE THEME GUARD üé®

Style changes detected. Ensure they align with Zombie IE6 horror-comedy theme:

‚úì Color Palette:
  - IE6 blues (#0055CC, #3399FF) for chrome
  - Windows XP grays (#ECE9D8, #D4D0C8) for toolbars
  - Garish 2000s colors (lime green, hot pink, electric blue)
  - Blood red (#8B0000) for horror accents
  - Avoid modern, muted, professional palettes

‚úì Typography:
  - Comic Sans MS, Papyrus, Impact for cursed text
  - Arial, Verdana, Times New Roman for "normal" text
  - NO modern fonts: Inter, Roboto, SF Pro, Helvetica Neue
  - Pixelated fonts for retro digital displays

‚úì Visual Effects:
  - CRT monitor glow and curvature
  - Scanlines and screen glitches
  - Ghost trails and floating sprites
  - Blood drips and flicker animations
  - All effects subtle enough to maintain usability

‚úì Retro Styling:
  - Beveled 3D buttons with inset/outset borders
  - Gradient backgrounds (linear, radial)
  - Drop shadows (heavy, not subtle)
  - Animated GIF support
  - Table borders and cellpadding

‚ùå FORBIDDEN:
  - Flat, minimal design
  - Smooth, professional aesthetics
  - Modern CSS features used in obvious ways
  - Clean, corporate color schemes

If styles drift from the cursed retro horror theme, suggest corrections based on zombie_ie_mode.md steering guide.
